T02D2828:174b-0: @174b * // 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2828:174b-1: shin tu snying rjes non pa'i yid //
T02D2828:174b-2: lus can mya ngan 'das pa las //
T02D2828:174b-3: bsam pa thag pas mgron gnyer pa //
T02D2828:174b-4: de yis pha rol bsdu bar bshad //
T02D2828:174b-5: nam langs mun pas sleb pa dang //
T02D2828:174b-6: gnyid du nye bas sad pa'i dus //
T02D2828:174b-7: dga' dang gdung ba skyes pa ni //
T02D2828:174b-8: de ni cho ga spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2828:174b-9: bdag gi lus gang lha yin te //
T02D2828:174b-10: dag ni yi ge bzhi nyid do //
T02D2828:174b-11: rnam par rtog dang mi rtog sems //
T02D2828:174b-12: snying rje che dang stong pa nyid //
T02D2828:174b-13: mig gnyis nyi ma 'bar ba dang //
T02D2828:174b-14: lce steng a'a k'a'i phreng bas brgyan //
T02D2828:174b-15: lte ba me thab 'khyil pa'i dbus //
T02D2828:174b-17: mi gang dbang du bya ba de'i //
T02D2828:174b-18: smin phrag gnyis dang lte ba'i dbus //
T02D2828:174b-19: dga' dang dad dang gdung ba nyid //
T02D2828:174b-20: thig le padmo aa yi gzugs //
T02D2828:174b-21: byams pa yin ni aa yi rgyun //
T02D2828:174b-22: bdag gi sprul pa la skyes reg / rab tu mi bzad snying rje can //
T02D2828:174b-23: dga' ba'i lta bas rnam par bzhu //
T02D2828:174b-24: btang snyoms tshad med blo gros che //
T02D2828:174b-27: 'bum phrag lnga rab ma yengs dang //
T02D2828:175a-0: lhag bsam bar chad spangs bsnyen @175a * //
T02D2828:175a-2: bde gshegs ring bsrel sku khrus sogs //
T02D2828:175a-3: brtse ldan rnams kyis sngags chur bcas //
T02D2828:175a-4: me tog dmar khus gdong bkrus la //
T02D2828:175a-5: lce dkyil sprang rtsi ldan sngags brjod //
T02D2828:175a-6: aom a'a:hr'i:shr'i lo ka n'a tha ma h'a k'a ru ni ka ho //
T02D2828:175a-8: che ge mo tsitta ma h'a p'a ra dha tsa la tsa la pra tsa la pra la dza: dza:dza:/
T02D2828:175a-9: blo gros bzang po snying rjes myos gyur pa //
T02D2828:175a-10: skye bo 'di dag thabs gang phrin las kyis //
T02D2828:175a-11: bde bar rung na bdag cir 'gyur blo'o zhes //
T02D2828:175a-12: nyin mtshan rtag tu yid byed mi 'bral na //
T02D2828:175a-14: zhag gsum drug gam dgu nyid na //
T02D2828:175a-15: lcags kyus bzhus pa'i yal ga ltar //
T02D2828:175a-16: gdon mi za bar de dbang 'gyur //
